title: Problem with support tickets.
body: So i wanted to send riot a question about League of Legends, but language option was only blank, so i thought "ok i guess they use google translate anyways", but i couldn't send ticket because language option is blank and it cannot be blank. Could someone help me with this?

replies.body: That's really weird, I'm not seeing any issues with selecting languages.  I'm curious if you have any extensions running that could be blocking it.  Try disabling them to make sure.  It might also be necessary to reset your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) in case the page isn't able to support your language.  Trying on another browser altogether might help too.  Let me know if that helps!

Thank you for reply. 

It was error on my end. I forgot to choose region since it wasn't marked with a red star. :P
